subject: Re: Thank you, we are ready to lend some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
 
$274,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
 
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this simple form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
 
http://ouarxqrpon.com/
